TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi TreeView extends System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl

summary.span: Represents a control that displays hierarchical data in a tree structure that has items that can expand and collapse.

span.span: Represents a control that displays hierarchical data in a tree structure that has items that can expand and collapse.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是，這表示它可以包含任何類型 （例如字串、 影像或面板） 之物件的集合。 is an , which means it can contain a collection of objects of any type (such as string, image, or panel). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別。For more information, see the class. 下圖顯示簡單。The following illustration shows a simple . ![TreeView 圖例](~/add/media/treeviewillustration.JPG "TreeView 圖例")![TreeView illustration](~/add/media/treeviewillustration.JPG "TreeView illustration") 內容是控制項可以包含豐富的內容，例如和控制項。The contents of a are controls that can contain rich content, such as and controls. A可以包含一或多個物件做為子系。A can contain one or more objects as its descendants. A定義的階層物件。A is defined as a hierarchy of objects. A可以繫結至資料來源，並使用填入其樹狀物件。A can populate its tree by binding to a data source and using objects. 資料來源的範例包括和物件。Examples of data sources include and objects. 顯示項目數量龐大，可能會造成效能問題。Displaying a large number of items may cause performance issues. 請參閱[最佳化效能： 控制項](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/optimizing-performance-controls.md)如需詳細資訊。See [Optimizing Performance: Controls](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/optimizing-performance-controls.md) for more information. 若要改善效能的，請參閱[如何： 改善效能的 treeview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-improve-the-performance-of-a-treeview.md)。To improve the performance of a , see [How to: Improve the Performance of a TreeView](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-improve-the-performance-of-a-treeview.md). 如需有關控制，請參閱[TreeView 概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/treeview-overview.md)。For more information about the control, see the [TreeView Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/treeview-overview.md). A具有有限的數目的層級。A has a limited number of levels. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . ## 自訂 TreeView 控制項Customizing the TreeView Control 若要套用至多個相同的屬性設定控制項，可使用屬性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 您可以修改預設來提供獨特的外觀的控制項。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 如需有關建立，請參閱[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的組件和所特有狀態，請參閱[TreeView 樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/treeview-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [TreeView Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/treeview-styles-and-templates.md). 對這個控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值時該控制項會出現在應用程式中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 預設樣式是由決定由哪個桌面主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). > [!NOTE] > 設定視覺化屬性只會影響該屬性是否存在於這兩控制項的預設範本，並且使用設定的。Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in control's default template and is set by using a . 您可以找到的視覺屬性清單中的 「 變更 Visual 結構的控制項 」 一節中[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何建立 。The following example shows how to create a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件資料的參數`e`提供包含和。The event data that the parameter `e` provides contains an and a . 設為先前已選取，或設為的項目`null`如果沒有任何先前選取的項目。The is set to the item that was previously selected, or is set to `null` if there is no previously selected item. 同樣地，設定至新選取的項目，或設為`null`如果不選取任何新的項目。Similarly, the is set to the newly selected item, or is set to `null` if no new item is selected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定用來判斷值的屬性路徑屬性。The property specifies the path to the property that is used to determine the value of the property. 例如，假設繫結至類型的物件集合`Employee`，其中包含兩個屬性呼叫`EmployeeName`和`EnployeeNumber`。For example, assume that a is bound to a collection of objects of type `Employee`, which has two properties called `EmployeeName` and `EnployeeNumber`. 您可以使用來顯示值`EmployeeName`中並設定至`"EmployeeNumber"`有傳回的值`EmployeeNumber`。You can use a to display the value of `EmployeeName` in the and set to `"EmployeeNumber"` to have return the value of `EmployeeNumber`. 屬性是唯讀屬性。The property is a read-only property. 若要選取的項目中的值變更，使用屬性來存取。To change the value of a selected item in a , use the property to access the . ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例所示使用顯示`EmployeeName`和`EmployeeWorkDay`屬性`Employee`並設定屬性`EmployeeNumber`。The following example shows a that uses a to display the `EmployeeName` and `EmployeeWorkDay` properties of an `Employee` and sets the property to the `EmployeeNumber`. 當您選取`EmployeeName`中、設`EmployeeNumber`。When you select an `EmployeeName` in the , the is set to the `EmployeeNumber`. [!code-xaml[TreeViewSelectedValue#SelectedValuePath](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TreeViewSelectedValue/CS/Window1.xaml#selectedvaluepath)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定用來判斷值的屬性路徑屬性。The property specifies the path to the property that is used to determine the value of the property. 例如，假設繫結至類型的物件集合`Employee`，其中包含兩個屬性呼叫`EmployeeName`和`EnployeeNumber`。For example, assume that a is bound to a collection of objects of type `Employee`, which has two properties called `EmployeeName` and `EnployeeNumber`. 您可以使用來顯示值`EmployeeName`中並設定至`"EmployeeNumber"`有傳回的值`EmployeeNumber`。You can use a to display the value of `EmployeeName` in the and set to `"EmployeeNumber"` to have return the value of `EmployeeNumber`. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例所示使用顯示`EmployeeName`和`EmployeeWorkDay`屬性`Employee`並設定屬性`EmployeeNumber`。The following example shows a that uses a to display the `EmployeeName` and `EmployeeWorkDay` properties of an `Employee` and sets the property to the `EmployeeNumber`. 當您選取`EmployeeName`中、設`EmployeeNumber`。When you select an `EmployeeName` in the , the is set to the `EmployeeNumber`.
